settings.custom_liquid:
<button type="button" name="add" class="sf__btn-icon sf-wishlist__button sf__tooltip-left sf__tooltip-style-1 added-to-wishlist added-to-wishlist_btn" 
data-product-handle="{{product.handle}}"
data-add-to-cart-text="Add to bag" style="text-transform: uppercase;background-color: #171343!important;color: #fff;border-color: transparent !important;width: 100%;  font-family: Source Code Pro !important;">
   Add to Wishlist
</button>
<script>
function fn1(){
let btn = document.querySelector('.added-to-wishlist_btn')
btn.addEventListener('click',()=>{
 btn.closest('.sf-prod-template').querySelector('.sf-wishlist__button').click()
})
} 
fn1()
</script>

settings.content:
Fast Shipping With a Cloud9linens Account
Please refer to your estimated arrival date in checkout once the shipping method is selected.
Free Extended Holiday Returns & Exchanges
Purchases made between October 18, 2023, and December 23, 2023, are eligible to be returned
until January 31, 2024. Personalized items and gift boxes cannot be returned.
Shipping & Returns
Cloud9linens Account members receive free Fast shipping. Sign In / Join (Details)
In addition to our regular shipping services, we also oer Buy Online, Pick Up in Store; Ship to
Store; Same Day Delivery; and UPS Store/UPS Access Point Pickup for your convenience.
Gifting Services
Add our luxurious navy box with signature gold foil lettering and a personalized
message at checkout.

<style>.transparent-on-top img.inline-block.lazyautosizes.lazyloaded, .transparent-on-top img.inline-block.lazyautosizes.ls-is-cached.lazyloaded {
    filter: unset;
}
.header__22 .transparent-on-top header .sf-menu-logo-bar ul.sf-nav li a {
    color: #041e3a;
}
.header__22 .icon-fill{
    fill: #000;
  }
.cus-col-container .sf__collection-container.block.mt-0.md\:mt-2\.5.lg\:mb-15.lg\:pt-7.sidebar__collapse {
    padding-top: 6rem;
}
.mw_breadcurmb_main {
    padding-top: 60px;
}
main#MainContent {
    padding-top: 60px;
}
.header__22:not(.stuck) .icon-fill-cart {
    filter: unset;
}
.header__22:not(.stuck) .icon-fill-serch {
    stroke: #000;
}
.cus-hdr .mobile____menu, .mob-logo-container img {
    filter: unset;
}
.connected-product{
   padding-bottom:0px !important;
}
.connected__products__inner h2, .recently-viewed h2 {
    font-size:18px;
    font-weight: 600;
}
</style>

<style>
@media only screen and (max-width: 767px) {
.cus-options-item {
    text-transform: uppercase !important;
}
.cus_drop_item {
    text-transform: uppercase;
}
.template-product .product-form__actions .not-change{
        font-size: 12px;
    }
h2.text-center.connected_heading_wd {
    font-size: 18px;
}
ol.breadcrumbs__list .breadcrumbs__item a:after {
    content: "/";
    padding-inline: 12px;
}
.qty-border {
  border-top: none !important;
}
.connected__products .custom_connected_product{
  border-bottom:none;
}
.cus-options-item {
    font-size: 14px;
}
.cus_drop_item .product-option-item {
    font-size: 14px;
    justify-content: space-between !important;
}
.cus_drop_item {
    gap: 10px;
}
.connected__products .connected_product_content form h3 {
    font-size: 18px;
}
.mw_custom_design .add_cart___btn_btn, .connected__products .connected_cart_btn {
    background-color: #171343!important;
    font-size: 12px;
}
.connected__products__inner h2, .recently-viewed h2 {
    font-size:18px;
    font-weight: 600;
}
}
</style>
